item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, December 3, 2024 at 6:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Tweaking Stunt Island's 30-year-old 3D Engine (115 points | 26 comments)
2. Broadcom loses another big VMware customer (85 points | 49 comments)
3. Skia Canvas: Browser-Less Implementation of the HTML Canvas Drawing API for Node (19 points | 8 comments)
4. Launch HN: Vocera (YC F24) – Testing and Observability for Voice AI (19 points | 6 comments)
5. We switched from Next.js to Astro (and why it might interest you) (29 points | 2 comments)
6. Lessons I learned working at an art gallery (350 points | 139 comments)
7. Amazon Aurora DSQL (45 points | 13 comments)
8. Stack Auth (YC S24), open-source Auth0 alternative, is hiring Founding SWEs ( | hide)
9. My Brand New Digitizing Workflow Using a 25 Year Old Film Scanner (5 points | discuss)
10. USC Student Rocket Group Shatters International Amateur Space Record (190 points | 165 comments)
11. The Curse of Markdown (25 points | 18 comments)
12. Ask HN: Why did no one save the Living Computers museum in Seattle? (14 points | 7 comments)
13. 'I'm running a Mud so I can learn C programming ' (1993) (57 points | 43 comments)
14. Intel Announces Arc B-Series "Battlemage" Discrete Graphics with Linux Support (19 points | 12 comments)
15. Rust in QEMU Roadmap (181 points | 76 comments)
16. Vintage digicams aren't just a fad. They're an artistic statement (69 points | 142 comments)
17. Amazon Nova (10 points | 3 comments)
18. MTA's A.I. bus cameras issue mistaken parking violations (8 points | 5 comments)
19. Show HN: Copper – Open-source robotics in Rust with deterministic log replay (152 points | 31 comments)
20. Distributed Erlang (151 points | 48 comments)
21. Ask HN: Who is hiring? (December 2024) (341 points | 319 comments)
22. Fish have a brain microbiome – could humans have one too? (312 points | 122 comments)
23. DuckDuckGo Donates $25k to the Perl and Raku Foundation (182 points | 90 comments)
24. The Last Viridian Note (2008) (15 points | 8 comments)
25. An English castle became a stork magnet (59 points | 14 comments)
26. Dependency management fatigue, or why I forever ditched React for Go+Htmx+Templ (94 points | 76 comments)
27. California teacher dies from suspected rabid bat bite (4 points | discuss)
28. World Labs: Generate 3D worlds from a single image (440 points | 130 comments)
29. South Korean Lawmakers Vote to Defy President, Demanding an End to Martial Law (8 points | discuss)
30. Two decades after Enron's bankruptcy, the company is back as a crypto firm? (59 points | 36 comments)
